name: Goji & Tarocco Orange Glass Jar Candle
about: Key Notes:Goji Berry, Mango, Orange.Burn Time:Up to 140 hours.Fragrance Description:This vivid scent shakes ripe mango and bittersweet goji berries wide awake while resting on a bed of tangy blood orange. Arousing the senses with tart tangerine and piquant pomelo nectar, the freshly squeezed and exhilarating aroma immediately lifts the spirits and adds vibrant shine to the day..About the Candle:Voluspa's clean-burning coconut wax blend is hand-poured into an embossed glass jar and topped with a lid that keeps the candle dust-free when not in use. The candle lasts for up to 140 hours of burn time. Voluspa candles are also designed and hand-poured in the USA and feature 100 percent natural wicks.
ingredients: Coconut Oil 84836-98-6, Benzyl Alcohol 100-51-6, Limonene 5989-27-5, 2,4,6-Trimethyl-4-Phenyl-1,3- Dioxane 5182-36-5, Linalool 78-70-6, Terpineol Acetate 8007-35-0, Gamma Undecalactone 104-67-6, Ethylmethylphenylglycidate 77-83-8, Decanal 112-31-2, Citronellol 106-22-9, Geranyl Acetate 105-87-3, 2,6, Dimethyl-7-Octen-2-Ol 18479-58-8, Citral 5392-40-5, Octanal 124-13-0, 2,4-Dimethyl-3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde 68039-49-6, 2-T-Butylcyclohexyl Acetate 88-41-5, Tetramethylacetyloctahydronaphthalenes 54464-57-2, 2-Ethyl-3-Hydroxy-4- Pyrone 1110651, Alpha-Terpineol 98-55-5, 3a,4,5,6,7,7a-Hexahydro-4,7- Methano-1(3)- Inden-6-Yl- Acetate 5413-60-5, Hexamethylindanopyran 1222-05-5, Hexyl Cinnamal 101-86-0, Dimethyl Phenethyl Butyrate 10094-34-5, Hexyl Acetate 142-92-7, Benzyl Acetate 140-11-4, Beta-Ionone 14901-07-6.
how_to_use: -Trim wicks to one-quarter inch with each burn. .-Place candle on candle's lid, which doubles as a candle holder.-Allow wax to melt to the candleu2019s edge with each burn to prevent tunnelling..-Stop burning your candle when less than one-quarter inch of wax remains..-Upcycle your empty vessel to create a keepsake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t be fooled. These candles have NO THROW!! Plus they tunnel because thereu2019s only one wick and canu2019t heat all the way to the edges.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another amazing candle by Voluspa. Candles from this brand seem to burn better than most other Sephora candle brands
